#summary All size speicifications of icons used on iOS apps.

== Icon specification ==

Icon的命名方式和大小对应关系：

||名称||Size||
||Icon.png||57 x 57||
||Icon@2x.png||114 x 114||
||Icon-72.png||72 x 72||
||Icon-Small.png||29 x 29||
||Icon-Small@2x.png||58 x 58||
||Icon-Small-50.png||50 x 50||

iTunesArtwork: 512 x 512
